nodes.text: The Dearic Capitol was the main governmental building of the planet Talus. It was located in the city of Dearic and housed the Talusian government. Prime Minister Hagrin Zeed and Minister of Protocol Haleen Snowline worked there during the Galactic Civil War. After the Battle of Yavin, CorSec Agent Dathnaeya Loessin was stationed at the Dearic Capitol.
The Dearic Capitol was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
